Create a rubber duck that doubles as a smartphone case. The rubber duck can be used as a phone cover and also as a waterproof phone case to protect your phone from water damage.
Design a rubber duck that can be used as a portable speaker for your music. The rubber duck can have built-in speakers that can play music from your phone or other devices.
Create a rubber duck that can be used as a stress reliever. The rubber duck can have a squeeze button that, when pressed, releases a calming scent or sound.
Design a rubber duck that can be used as a desk lamp. The rubber duck can have a built-in LED light that can be used as a desk lamp to help you read or work at night.

Create a rubber duck that can be used as a car accessory. The rubber duck can be used as a car accessory to help keep your car clean and free of debris. The rubber duck can be designed to be easily attached to the car's windshield or other surfaces.
